name: fnsn

stmt.origin: mp2an(wfn(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wfn(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wfn(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wfn(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wfn(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: Functionality and domain of the singleton of an ordered pair. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)
